H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H5512.def: = desert; ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between {L:Sea of Reeds<SDBH:יָם־סוּף>} and {L:Dophkah<SDBH:דָּפְקָה>}; ► the {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}
